traits.name: Companionship
traits.description: Can tame and command certain animals and monsters.

traits.name: Instinctual
traits.description: Can sense traps nearby, traps are highlighted.

traits.name: Steelmind
traits.description: Unaffected by illusions or fear.

traits.name: Shadowstalker
traits.description: Summons a stalker minion to protect its owner during the night.

traits.name: Lucky
traits.description: Gets an extra dice roll for loot drops, taking the better roll of the two.

traits.name: Supportive
traits.description: Applies all character buffs to other players nearby.

traits.name: Stealthy
traits.description: Stealth skill is 10% more effective.

traits.name: Resourceful
traits.description: 25% chance to not deplete a resource when depletion check happens.

traits.name: Craftmanship
traits.description: Builds and repairs objects 25% faster

traits.name: Quick Reflexes
traits.description: 15% chance to dodge incoming melee hits.

traits.name: Hardy
traits.description: 10% reduced damage from incoming melee hits.

traits.name: Intuitive
traits.description: Magical skills are 10% more effective.

traits.name: Marksman
traits.description: Non-magic projectiles have 25% less chance to break on impact, and 10% less chance to miss.

traits.name: Herbal Life
traits.description: Can tell which plants are edible and which are poisonous.

traits.name: Eagle Eyed
traits.description: Has a 25% larger vision range during the day.

traits.name: Toxicologist
traits.description: Can create poisons from herbs that can be applied to weaponry and munitions.

traits.name: Quick Learner
traits.description: Learns skills 25% faster than others.

traits.name: Night Owl
traits.description: Has a 25% larger vision range when in the dark, npcs highlighted at night.

traits.name: Fast Healer
traits.description: Recovers health and broken limbs 25% faster.

traits.name: Vampiric
traits.description: When killing a bleeding enemy, 25% chance to recover 5-10% of current missing health. 25% of all damage is dealt as unholy damage.

traits.name: Scammer
traits.description: Will receive 10% more currency when selling to traders.

traits.name: Polyglot
traits.description: Social skill is 10% more effective.

traits.name: Divine
traits.description: Silver weaponry is 20% more effective against vampires and werewolves, you take 10% more unholy damage. 25% of all damage is dealt as radiant damage.

traits.name: Pious
traits.description: A deeply held devotion to a divine entity or higher power. You have 5% chance to smite undead at 30% of their health.

traits.name: Werewolf Curse
traits.description: Turns into a werewolf during a full-moon. Increased melee damage by 50% in werewolf form, all npcs except wolves become hostile to the werewolf. 25% of all damage is dealt as unholy damage.

traits.name: Unlucky
traits.description: Gets an extra dice roll for loot drops, taking the worst roll of the two.

traits.name: Ethnic Kinship
traits.description: Cannot directly harm others of the same race, unless through indirect harm (traps, companions, non-targeted skills).

traits.name: Unfriendly
traits.description: Social skill is 10% less effective.

traits.name: Psychotic
traits.description: Will inflict cuts on himself occassionaly, applying a bleed debuff on itself.

traits.name: Noctophobia
traits.description: Reduced effectiveness of combat skills by 25% at night.

traits.name: Frail Bones
traits.description: Has a 10% higher chance to break a limb when hit by a strong attack.

traits.name: Hemophobia
traits.description: Has a 10% reduced effectiveness of combat skills when bleeding.

traits.name: Nomads Curse
traits.description: Has a 25% reduced effectiveness of all skills when in the same area for more than 2 days.

traits.name: Slow Healer
traits.description: Recovers health and broken limbs 25% slower.

traits.name: Undead
traits.description: Everything is hostile to you except undead or creatures of the night.

traits.name: Misanthrope
traits.description: Has 20% increased prices when buying from traders.

traits.name: Ailment Magnet
traits.description: Has 10% more chance to contract an illness or debuff.

traits.name: Unholy
traits.description: You take 10% increased damage from radiant attacks, you deal 20% more unholy damage.

traits.name: Sleepy
traits.description: Becomes tired 10% faster.

traitpresets.Name: Vampire
traitpresets.Description: Undead beings that sustain themselves by consuming the blood of the living.

traitpresets.Name: Werewolf
traitpresets.Description: Cursed beings that that turn into a vile bloodthirsty creature at full-moon.

traitpresets.Name: Construction Worker
traitpresets.Description: Worked all his life in construction, is an expert craftsman.

traitpresets.Name: Herbalist
traitpresets.Description: Specializes in the identification, gathering, and use of various herbs, plants, and natural ingredients for a variety of purposes.

traitpresets.Name: Traveler
traitpresets.Description: Cannot stay in one place for very long, has a constant urge to explore new areas.
